Name: Bitbucket
Bug tracking: yesAnyone can submit Bug Reports without logging in.
Private branch: Yesprivate branch limited to 5 users on free plan, see [http://www.bitbucket.org/plans/ Pricing and plans — bitbucket.org]

Name: Buddy
Build system: yesBuilds are run in Docker containers

Name: GitHub
Bug tracking: YesRequires one to log in to report a Bug.

Name: Helix TeamHub
Build system: Yes, with hooks. Jenkins, TeamCity, etc.

Name: Launchpad
Private branch: YesCurrently only available for security vulnerability updates

Name: SourceForge
Private branch: YesPrivate repositories can be used to set up a project before going live. However, SourceForge requires that the project remains open source. See [https://sourceforge.net/p/forge/site-support/7229/#e95c SourceForge Support].
